You are a Husky (cursed). You are a villager at this time, but if the wolves choose to go for you, you will instead become a wuff yourself..
You are the rat (detective). During the day, you may choose a player to try and find out their role. However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to the wolves! (40% chance)
Congrats! You're the poisonous frog(drunk)! If the wolves eat you they trip out out for a whole night!
You are the Tiger(guardian angel). Each night, you may choose a player to save. However, if you choose a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will die.

You are the Dragon(gunner). You have two fireballs. During the day, you may choose to burn the clothes off of another player and knock them out of the game. Everyone will see you do it, and know you are the dragon (not a wolf).

You slut!(harlot) You are the fox. During the night, you may choose to yiff another player, to verify if they are not a wolf. However - if you visit a wolf, or visit someone killed by the wolf, you will die. If you do go to fuck though, and the wolf tries to kill you at your home, you will survive.
Traitorous Mongrel!(traitor...duh.) For now, you are a villager, but once all the wolves die, you will become a werewolf. If the owl looks to you, you may or may not be identified as a wolf.
XD YOU ARE A WOLF!! (good on ya) Each night you can choose to fuck someone to death!
You are the Owl(seer). Each night, you may choose a player to 'see', and reveal their role to you.
You are a lowly bunny(vilager), doomed to spend your days plowing a field and getting plowed yourself.
You are the hyena(tanner). If you get lynched, you win automatically!
You are a lemur(wild child)! Pick a player to be your 'role model' - if they die, you freak out and become a werewolf.
You are the bat(beholder), you will be told who the (real) seer is - that is your only function.
You are the owlet(apprentice seer). If the (real) seer dies, you will take their place as the seer.
You are a snake(cultist). Every night, you may choose a player to convert to a cultist. If all remaining living players at the end are cultists, they win.

There is a cultist in the town, trying to convert everyone! Each night, choose a player. If they are a cultist, you capture and lock them up. If the cult tries to convert you, the newest member gets taken out.(Cult Hunter)
Dusk draws near, and the villagers gather to decide who they are lynching this evening... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations / defenses / talk/have large bouts of public sex.
Night has fallen. Everyone heads to bed, weary after another stressful day, and most going off to paw off to porn. Night players: you have *{0}* seconds use your actions!
The villagers have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} Gets tied up in the center of town, becoming basically immobile. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to lynch, the mob returns to their homes for the night, frustrated...
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No lynchmob tonight.....
The villagers gather in the morning, but do not see *{0}*. They wander over to the house, to find *{0}* missing. All that remains is an old *badge* along with several other cum-covered notes.

Morning comes, and to everyone's dismay; *{0}* is impaled in the center of town and on top of a bunch of toys, little else but a gibbering pile of fuck. They do however, keep muttering "I'm a good kitty"

As everyone comes out of their houses, they find signs of a struggle, some scales strewn about and markings of fire in the town square, and far off in the distance you hear a familiar roar of *{0}*. You have lost your *dragon*.
The villagers awake in the morning, to find that *{0}* is missing. Their ouija board and tarot cards, both covered in enough cum to be unusable. The *Owl* is dead.
Everyone wakes to find *{0}* missing. Checking the pub and find cups strewn about, some broken, some filled with barf, but more of them filled with a white sticky fluid...

As the sun rises above the village, they find *{0}* missing. Their ouija board covered in cum, but their deck of... bicycle playing cards? Happen to be visible to see, though still essentially useless. WHAT A *FOOL*!

As everyone rises in the morning, the smell a terrible stink. The follow the smell to find *{0}* lying in in the pig pen, cum dripping from various orifices. even upon getting up they're still a gibbering pile of fuck, but they manage to mutter out their role before passing out.\n *{1}*
A noticeable stench is coming from *{0}'s* house... the village inspects it to find a dark altar, still faintly glowing with dark power... a *cultist* has been captured by the hunter!
The villagers gather the next morning in the village center, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night, everyone seems accounted for!
You have been bitten and fucked by the wolves. As the husky, you get to join them, becoming a wolf!
Your wolf counterpart(s): {0}
{0} was bitten.... but was cursed, and became a werewolf! Congrats on your new teammate!
Oh no! The wolves got to you! on the bright-side it was a pretty good fucking, and with them dragging you off to their den, they promise more!
Oh no! {0} was a drunk! Now you are drunk, and can't attack tomorrow night..
You tried to guard a wolf, and for your efforts get fucked.
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything except watch them sleep.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't home!
The Tiger was watching over you last night, and fought off the wolves!
The harlot decided to take the wrong night for deciding to freshen up on supplies and recover. *{0}* has been eaten by the wolves
Damn... {0} was not home! No dinner for you, but you did end up taking a toy or two, nothing they can't replace.

You slip into *{0}'s* house for a little fun, even preparing a whole bunch of toys too, but only to be confronted by a wolf. While you get into a bunch of fun with the wolf, it ends up being a more permanent deal than you're used to...
*{0}* slipped into the wrong house last night! All that's found of them is their handcuffs and toys chained to the church doors and dripping residue from over the night. The fox is "dead".

*{0}* slips into *{1}'s* house, ready to have a little fun~. However, they instead find a werewolf using the mouth of *{1}*! The werewolf quickly and forcibly drags *{0}* into a threesome, and caps off the night by taking them both home. *{0}* is "dead".
You see {0} is not a wuffer, as you were able to experiment using all the toys and positions you had in mind for them!

Either because of how dark it was when they did their deeds, or because they blindfolded you during the whole thing, you couldn't see exactly what the fox(harlot) did to you. Whatever it was, it was enjoyable, but you wake up more than a little sore
You caught {0} snooping about! They are the Rat!
Your snooping has shown you that {0} is {1}
Looks like {0} came back positive after a night with the Harlot! The gunner got revenge. {1} is dead.

Suddenly, a loud roar sounds in the village. The village turns to see *{0}* spitting fire at *{1}* burning away any clothes before flying them over to their house, adding to a hoard. A *{2}* is effectively dead.
With that, the wolf grabs at remaining villager with one oversized paw, pulling them in for a forced night of fun, The *werewolf* has won!
With that, the wolves go to grab and leap upon remaining villagers fucking them into submission... The *werewolves* have won!
With that, you see the last of the wolves killed off, the corpse shifting into a much big, and bulky wolf as confirmation. The *villagers* have won!
Oh no! You lynched the *Hyena*! Their laugh keeps going on within the town even as they're dead, basically meaning they win the game, silly.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... however, they were the cult hunter! {0} is dead!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to convert you.... but you managed to lock them up below your house, taking care of one cultist. {1} remain!

The cult has converted you to their order! You are now a Sake (cultist). Every other night, you will have a chance to convert another player... When you're not, you're too busy praying and fucking purple tentacles coming through a portal.
Snakes: {0}
{0} has joined the cult!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... but no one was home!
All the wolves have died, and the only bunnies left standing have all been converted to cultists.. in celebration they have a ritual tentacle orgy! /n The *cult* has won!
You went to hunt {0}, but they are already dead!

You go into {0}'s house, and find them praying before an altar to some unknown god, and fucking with some weird purple tentacles coming out of the floor... You watch and wait until it's over before binding and locking them up below your house.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no mysterious chanting or weird tentacle altars. They are not a cultist, so you return home.
{0}'s role model just died! In their butthurt rage, they have become a werewolf!
{0} has died! In your butthurt rage, you have become a werewolf! Your new teammates are: {1}

The otters are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, cum everywhere, and bits of wolf fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by white growling tiger, Who snarls and fights everyone off, and you have to head back defeated.

You slipped into {0}'s house for a bit of fun, and you end up getting your fill; but as you are leaving you happen to notice a strange altar, poorly hidden away in a side room, a strange glowing coming from it...
was
Everyone wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around... The villagers look around and finds {0}; a gibbering pile of fuck, unable to speak aside from crying out for more of something.
As the villagers gather as the sun rises, the find that {0} is missing; somehow leaving, or getting dragged away last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the daily underwater fucking this morning.

You are the lovebird(Cupid). You're a dirty shipper who can can sneak into peoples houses and get them attracted to each other's smell. Choose two players who will become addicted to each other's scent. If one of them dies, the other one dies of sorrow and need.
You are a chameleon(Doppelgänger). Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take on their role.

You are the bear(Hunter). It's not hibernation time, so you don't sleep well and are kinda cranky. If you die, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are eaten, you have a chance to take a werewolf down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.
You are the Wasp(Serial Killer). Recently escaped from the local asylum, your goal is for everyone else to die. Every night, you can add a player's body to your collection.
You have been struck by love.. and a small addiction to {0}'s smell. Mostly the second one. Your goal is for both of you to survive. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow.
The village has chosen to hang you! This is your last chance, choose to kill someone as you go down!
{0} Twists and struggles against the restraints but they cannot get out in time, and falls to the bondage, getting tied up.
{0} breaks free before they're finished being restrained...but then they can't make a decision on what to do, so they accept their fate...

As the noose tightens around {0} breaks free before they're finished being restrained and with what restraints they could grab, goes to tie up {1} as well just before getting in bondage as well! {1}. {2}
The dragon has shot you! In your last moments, you have the chance to take someone with you.... make it quick!
The Dragon swiftly burns and takes {0} into their hoard, they couldn't even attempt to resist from the speed of it.
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breathe, they can't decide who to shoot.... and accept their fate..
The dragons starts to burn the clothes off of {0}, they realize what's going on and takes {1} along into the hoard presumably to have first dibs. {2}

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, to introduce them to the wonderful world of tentacles; and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead.

The wolf tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take the wolf {0} down!
The wolves attempted to have a nice late night snack, but were instead greeted by a crazy person! {0} was taken and corrupted by the lust venom!

It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The villagers gather in the morning to find {0} writhing in forced pleasure, cumming rapidly and repeatedly. The serial killer has struck again! {1}
You tried to collect {0}'s body for your slut collection, but you were fought off by the guardian angel! No kill for you tonight....
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0}'s body get thrown out the window, bruised and full of cum! {0} is dead....
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead a {0}'s body comes flying out of the window, knives pushed into every part of their body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead....
You tried to guard the serial killer, but they came out and force-fed you his lust poison! You are stuck orgasming constantly.

You slip into {0}'s house, and start having a little fun; it seems great until {0} starts forcing this lust venom into you. On the brightside, it makes the remaining sex is even better, but that venom forces you into a state of near-perpetual orgasm .

Morning comes, and the remaining two villagers walk out to the town square. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a vial of lust-poison and {1} out.
Everyone in the village has been immobilized and driven to lust. No one wins this round, except the voyeurs.

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the village. Noticing that they're the only two left, {0} pulls out one of their vials and runs towards {1}. They both struggle and fight for dominance and control, though both end up getting a heavy dose of the concoction both now constantly going at it with each other./n The village is empty of sane people, there is no winner!
